page.title: 12OUR HOMES IN HAMSTERLEY
page.content: There is a variety of housing in the area and includes a new housing estate on the edge of the village,old and new large and small houses in the village farmhouses and renovated cottages and lodges in the countryside. Katie and Andrew live about 2 miles from the village.Katie says of it,"The house we live in is white and black.It used to be the gate house to Shull House.Now the gates have been taken down.In our house there are 8 rooms, the bathroom,kitchen,3 bedrooms,living room,hall and conservatory.The stairs are in the corner of the living room. Mine is the only bedroom upstairs, except the mice who go in the big cupboard.We have a coal fire in the living room and oil central heating. You go into the garden through a French window.It is on 3 sides of the house with lawns,shrubs and a rockery.
